post.text: The Clinton's are the real predators...

comment.author: Chance
comment.text: Democrats are not evil. Trump is a sociopath. if you can't recognize one when you see one, then you are pitifull

replies.author: Chance

replies.author: Anders
replies.text: #BigotedChance You are indeed a sociopath... Not because you are not running for highest office (probably you are illegal immigrant), you are not corrupt!!! Since you are ignorant at most, he already filed his taxes to the commission (it is a must to run for president), he does NOT have to show you his taxes because you are stupid... Which indeed is the case... As being from UK, your beloved president came to UK and told us what to vote... So you can take your sorry face back to where you are originally from... (Asia)
